import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Card} from 'react-bootstrap'; export default class Summary extends Component { render() { const {summary,currentDate}=this.props; return ( <>

GLOBAL DATA

New Confirmed

{summary.NewConfirmed}

{new Date (currentDate).toDateString()}

Total Confirmed

{summary.TotalConfirmed}

{new Date (currentDate).toDateString()}

New Deaths

{summary.NewDeaths}

{new Date (currentDate).toDateString()}

Total Deaths

{summary.TotalDeaths}

{new Date (currentDate).toDateString()}

Total Recovered

{summary.TotalRecovered}

{new Date (currentDate).toDateString()}
) } }
